eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
ds^2&=& H^{-1/2} (d\sigma_{8,1}^2) + H^{1/2} dx^2 \nonumber\\
e^{\phi}&=& H^{-5/4} \nonumber\\
H&=& c+|\tilde{M}| |x|=c+\frac{m}{l_s}|x|
\

\begin{eqnarray}
ds^2&=& \bar{H}^{-1/2}(d\bar{\sigma}_{8,1}^2)+\bar{H}^{1/2} d\bar{x}^2
\nonumber\\
e^{\phi}&=& e^{\phi_0}\bar{H}^{-5/4}=g_s \bar{H}^{-5/4}
\nonumber\\
\bar{H}&=&H/c= 1+ g_s |\tilde{M}| |\bar{x}| =1+ \frac{g_s m}{l_s}|\bar{x}|
\

\begin{eqnarray}
R_{11}  =\frac{\alpha ^2}{2} &&
R_{12} = \frac{\alpha^3 z_3}{2} \nonumber\\
R_{22} = -\frac{\alpha^2}{2}(1
-\alpha^2(z_3)^2) && R_{33} = -\frac{\alpha^2}{2} ~.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
T_1:&& z_1\rightarrow z_1+a_1, z_2\rightarrow z_2, z_3\rightarrow
z_3\nonumber\\
T_2:&&z_2\rightarrow z_2+a_2, z_1\rightarrow z_1, z_3\rightarrow
z_3\nonumber\\
T_3:&&z_3\rightarrow z_3+a_3, z_1\rightarrow z_1-\alpha z_2a_3, 
z_2\rightarrow z_2
\

\begin{eqnarray}
ds^2&=& (  dx_3^2 +  dx_2^2 
+ dx_1^2)\nonumber\\
B_{12}&=& m x_3 \Rightarrow H_{123}=m \nonumber\\
e^{\phi}&=& e^{\phi_0}~.
\label{aftert1}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
ds^2 &=& dx_1^2  +  \frac{(dx_2^2
  + dx_3^2  )}{ 1 + m^2 x_1^2 }    \nonumber\\
B_{23}dx^2 \wedge dx^3&=& - \frac{m x_1}{1+ m^2 x_1^2 } dx_2 \wedge dx_3
 \nonumber\\
e^{\phi} &=& \frac{e^{\phi_0}}{ (1+ m^2 x_1^2 )^{1/2}}~.
\label{aftrt3}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
a &= & \begin{pmatrix} 1&0 \\ 0 &1 \end{pmatrix} \nonumber \\
b &= & \begin{pmatrix}0&0 \\ 0 &0 \end{pmatrix}   \nonumber \\
c &= & \begin{pmatrix}0&m \\ -m &0\end{pmatrix}\nonumber \\
d &= & \begin{pmatrix}1&0 \\ 0 &1 \end{pmatrix}~.\nonumber  \\
\label{abcd}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
ds^2 &=& d\sigma^2_{5,1} + H(dx^2 + d\tilde{y}_1^2) +\frac{d
\tilde{y}_2^2 +d\tilde{y}_3^2}{H} \nonumber\\
e^{\tilde\phi}&=& \frac{\bar l_s^3e^{\phi_0}}{\bar r_1\bar r_2\bar r_3 \sqrt{H}}\nonumber\\
\left[ \tilde{y}_2, \tilde{y}_3 \right] &=&-i (m
\frac{\bar r_1}{\bar r_2\bar r_3})\bar l_s^2
\tilde{y}_1= -i\tilde{\alpha}\tilde{y}_1\nonumber\\
H&=&1+ \frac{m \bar r_1}{\bar r_2 \bar r_3}|x|= 1+ \frac{m \bar r_1 \bar l_s^2}{\bar r_2 \bar r_3} |X|
=1+\tilde{\alpha} |X|~,
\label{noncomm}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
T_1:&& \Omega_1 X_1 \Omega_1^{-1}=X_1+1
\nonumber\\
&&\Omega_1 X_2 \Omega_1^{-1}=X_2\nonumber\\
&& \Omega_1 X_3 \Omega_1^{-1}=X_3
\label{xone}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
T_2:&& \Omega_2 X_1 \Omega_2^{-1}=X_1
\nonumber\\
&&\Omega_2 X_2 \Omega_2^{-1}=X_2+1\nonumber\\
&& \Omega_2 X_3 \Omega_2^{-1}=X_3 \nonumber\\
T_3:&&\Omega_3 X_1\Omega_3^{-1}= X_1-m X_2\label{dercom}\\
&&\Omega_3 X_2 \Omega_3^{-1}=X_2 \nonumber\\
&&\Omega_3 X_3 \Omega_3^{-1} =X_3 +1 ~.\label{xthree} 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\left[ y_i, y_j \right] &=& i \theta_{ij}(y_1)  = 
 i \theta^{\prime}_{ij}(y_1)   \nonumber \\
\left[\partial_i, y_j \right] &=& \delta^i_j + \Psi^i_j(\partial)   
\nonumber\\
\label{crup}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\ytp =  w_2 + i \theta \frac{\ptl}{\ptl w_3 }   \nonumber \\
\ythp = w_3 - i \theta \frac{\ptl}{\ptl w_2}       \nonumber \\ 
\yttp =  w_2 - i \theta \frac{\ptl}{\ptl w_3 }  \nonumber \\ 
\ythtp = w_2 + i \theta  \frac{\ptl}{\ptl w_2 } ~.\nonumber \\
\label{phsprl} 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&& [ \frac{\ptl}{\partial y_i^{\prime} }, \frac{\ptl}{\ptl
   y_j^{\prime} } ]
 =-i (\theta^{-1})^{ij} \nonumber\\
 &&[ \frac{\ptl}{\ptl \tilde y_i^{\prime} }, \frac{\ptl}{\partial
     \tilde y_j^{\prime}  }  ] 
 = + i(\theta^{-1})^{ij} ~.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&&\Omega_1 X_1 \Omega_1^{-1} =X_1 +1 \nonumber\\
&&\Omega_2 X_2 \Omega_2^{-1} =X_2 + 1 \nonumber\\
&& \Omega_3 X_3 \Omega _3 ^{-1} = X_3 +1 \nonumber\\
&& \Omega _3 X_1 \Omega _3^{-1} = X_1 -m X_2 
\label{constra}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&&2r_3^2 \frac{d}{dt} [H \dot{X}_3]=2r_1^2 m\dot{X}_2 H^{-1} (\dot{X}_1
+ m X_3 \dot {X} _2)\nonumber\\
&&2\frac{d}{dt} [H \dot{X}] = H' [(\dot{X}^2 +r_3^2 \dot{X}^2_3 +r_2^2 
\dot{X}_2^2 ) -r_1^2 H^{-1}(\dot{X}_1 + mx_3 \dot{X}_2)^2 ]\nonumber\\
&& \frac{d}{dt} [H^{-1} (\dot{X}_1 +mX_3 \dot {X}_2)] =0 \nonumber\\
&& \frac{d}{dt} [ \frac{2mX_3}{H}(\dot{X}_1 + mX_3 \dot{X}_2) + H
r_2^2 \dot{X}_2] =0~.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
f \star g &=& \sum_n \hbar^n \sum _{\Gamma \in G_n} w_{\Gamma}  B_{\Gamma,
  \theta}(f,g)\nonumber\\
w_{\Gamma}&=& \frac{1}{n! (2\pi)^2n}\int _{H_n} \Lambda_{i=1}^n
(d\phi_{e^1_k} \wedge d\phi_{e^2_k})
\

\begin{eqnarray}
f \star g &=& fg + \hbar \theta^{ij} \partial_i f \partial _j g
+\frac{\hbar^2 }{2} \theta^{ij} \theta^{kl} \partial_i \partial_k f 
\partial _j \partial l g \nonumber\\
&&+\frac{\hbar^2}{3} (\theta^{ij}\partial_j\theta^{kl} )
(\partial_i \partial_k f \partial _l g-\partial_k f \partial_i
\partial_l g) +{\cal O}(\hbar^3)~.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
ds^2&=& [-2dx^+dx^- +\frac{R^2(dx_2^2+dx_3^2)}{R^2+(x^+)^2}]-
\frac{x_2^2(dx^+)^2}{(x^+)^2}+\frac{2x_2x^+dx_2dx^+}{R^2+(x^+)^2}\nonumber\\
B&=&[\frac{Rx^+ dx_2\wedge dx_3}{R^2+(x^+)^2}]-\frac{Rx_2 dx^+\wedge
  dx_3}{R^2
+(x^+)^2}\nonumber\\
e^{\phi}&=&g_s\sqrt{\frac{R^2}{R^2+(x^+)^2}}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
x^+&=& {x'}^+\nonumber\\
x_2&=& x_2'{x'}^+\nonumber\\
x^-&=& {x'}^- +\frac{1}{2} {x'}^+x_2^2
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&&\int dx^2 dx^3 {\rm tr} F_{23} = n_m^{23}\nonumber\\
&& \int dx^2 dx^3 {\rm tr} F_{01} =n_e^{23} g_{YM}^2 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&& {\rm tr}F_{23}=\frac{n_m^{23}}{\tilde{R}_2\tilde{R}_3}\nonumber\\
&& {\rm tr}F_{01}=\frac{n_e^{23} g_{YM}^2}{\tilde{R}_2\tilde{R}_3}~.

\begin{eqnarray}

&=& \int[F_{ij}^2(1+3F_{23}\theta^{23})]

M_P^6 \prod_i \tilde{R}_i~.
